javadoc: Notification for a new Program Tree selection.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: source
params.comment: name of the plugin that generated this event

params.name: treeName
params.comment: name of the tree in the program

params.name: groupPaths
params.comment:
group paths that are selected in a Program Tree; the
 group path uniquely identifies a Module (folder) or fragment in the
 tree

methods.javadoc: Get the group paths that are in the tree selection.
methods.name: getGroupPaths
methods.comment: Get the group paths that are in the tree selection.

methods.javadoc:
Get the tree name associated with this event.
@return String tree name
methods.name: getTreeName
methods.comment: Get the tree name associated with this event.

methods.javadoc:
String representation of this event for debugging purposes.
@see java.lang.Object#toString()
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: String representation of this event for debugging purposes.

name: TreeSelectionPluginEvent
comment: Notification for a new Program Tree selection.
